General.Name: Ilsung Pharm
General.Description: Ilsung Pharmaceuticals Co., Ltd. operates as a pharmaceutical company in South Korea. Its products include antibiotics, analgesics, muscle relaxants, anti-coagulants, circulatory system drugs, contrast agents, diabetes treatments, digestive system medicines, anti-virals, anti-emetics, respiratory treatments, anesthetics, antipyretics, and cardiovascular system products. Ilsung Pharmaceuticals Co., Ltd. was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
